resources.string: Campus 411 is a one-stop service center that can assist you with any questions regarding your admission, academic record, financial aid, registration, and your student account.

Our mission is to provide a centralized location where the University community is effectively and efficiently served, resolve issues in support of educational goals, and empower students to manage their academic life.
This is just a large, ugly ListView of all of the unique places on campus. Clicking on one pulls up a crappy old Google Maps API view. I WANT IT BEAUTIFUL!
Again another ugly ListView, but it\'s parsed from somewhere online which is cool, but clicking an article opens up the browser to it, instead of bringing the data to you.
The lyrics to the "The Pride of Cleveland" and a play/pause button for the fight song to be played.
ListView of tech related things, and some buttons withing those things.
ListView of dining locations. All items bring you to websites of places, which isn\'t a terrible idea.
ListView of parking garages, when clicked bring you to the old Google Maps view of them.
Page of text with links to all of their social network accounts.
